verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> hath taken אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> When a man אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife וּבְעָלָ֑הּ <WH1166> and married וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> happens אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֧א <WH3808> no תִמְצָא־ <WH4672> her and it come to pass that she find חֵ֣ן <WH2580> no favour בְּעֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> in his eyes כִּי־ <WH3588> because מָ֤צָא <WH4672> because he hath found בָהּ֙ עֶרְוַ֣ת <WH6172> uncleanness דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> some וְכָ֨תַב <WH3789> in her then let him write לָ֜הּ סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> her a bill כְּרִיתֻת֙ <WH3748> of divorcement וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> and give בְּיָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> [it] in her hand וְשִׁלְּחָ֖הּ <WH7971> and send מִבֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> her out of his house
וְיָצְאָ֖ה <WH3318> And when she is departed out מִבֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> of his house וְהָלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> she may go וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> and becomes לְאִישׁ־ <WH376> man's אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> and be another

וּשְׂנֵאָהּ֮ <WH8130> hate הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> husband הָאַחֲרוֹן֒ <WH314> And [if] the latter וְכָ֨תַב <WH3789> her and write לָ֜הּ סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> her a bill כְּרִיתֻת֙ <WH3748> of divorcement וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> and giveth בְּיָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> [it] in her hand וְשִׁלְּחָ֖הּ <WH7971> and sendeth מִבֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> her out of his house א֣וֹ <WH176> or כִ֤י <WH3588> if יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> die הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> husband הָאַחֲר֔וֹן <WH314> or if the latter אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who לְקָחָ֥הּ <WH3947> which took ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> her [to be] his wife

לֹא־ <WH3808> is not יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> may בַּעְלָ֣הּ <WH1167> husband הָרִאשׁ֣וֹן <WH7223> Her former אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who שִׁ֠לְּחָהּ <WH7971> which sent her away לָשׁ֨וּב <WH7725> her again לְקַחְתָּ֜הּ <WH3947> not take לִהְי֧וֹת <WH1961> become ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> to be his wife אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֻטַּמָּ֔אָה <WH2930> that she is defiled כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that תוֹעֵבָ֥ה <WH8441> for that [is] abomination הִ֖וא <WH1931> he לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תַחֲטִיא֙ <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and thou shalt not cause the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> hath taken אִישׁ֙ <WH376> When a man אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> wife חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <WH2319> a new לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יֵצֵא֙ <WH3318> he shall not go out בַּצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> to war וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> neither shall he be charged עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> with לְכָל־ <WH3605> any דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> with any business נָקִ֞י <WH5355> [but] he shall be free יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become לְבֵיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> at home שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> one וְשִׂמַּ֖ח <WH8055> and shall cheer up אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <WH802> his wife אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom לָקָֽח׃ <WH3947> which he hath taken ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> No יַחֲבֹ֥ל <WH2254> to pledge רֵחַ֖יִם <WH7347> the nether וָרָ֑כֶב <WH7393> or the upper millstone כִּי־ <WH3588> for נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> [a man's] life ה֥וּא <WH1931> he חֹבֵֽל׃ <WH2254> to pledge ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> If יִמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> be found אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> If a man גֹּנֵ֨ב <WH1589> stealing נֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> any מֵאֶחָיו֙ <WH251> of his brethren מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהִתְעַמֶּר־ <WH6014> and maketh merchandise בּ֖וֹ וּמְכָר֑וֹ <WH4376> of him or selleth וּמֵת֙ <WH4191> shall die הַגַּנָּ֣ב <WH1590> him then that thief הַה֔וּא <WH1931> you וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> from among

הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <WH8104> Take heed בְּנֶֽגַע־ <WH5061> in the plague הַצָּרַ֛עַת <WH6883> of leprosy לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> that thou observe מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> diligently וְלַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> and do כְּכֹל֩ <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יוֹר֨וּ <WH3384> shall teach אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> according to all that the priests הַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> the Levites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you צִוִּיתִ֖ם <WH6680> you as I commanded תִּשְׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> them [so] ye shall observe לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to do ס

זָכ֕וֹר <WH2142> Remember אֵ֧ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> did יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לְמִרְיָ֑ם <WH4813> unto Miriam בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way בְּצֵאתְכֶ֥ם <WH3318> after that ye were come forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH5383> When thou dost lend בְרֵֽעֲךָ <WH7453> thy brother מַשַּׁ֣את <WH4859> thing מְא֑וּמָה <WH3972> any לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָבֹ֥א <WH935> thou shalt not go אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> into his house לַעֲבֹ֥ט <WH5670> to fetch עֲבֹטֽוֹ׃ <WH5667> his pledge

בַּח֖וּץ <WH2351> abroad תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> Thou shalt stand וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> and the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> to whom אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you נֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH5383> to whom thou dost lend ב֔וֹ יוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> shall bring out אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> about אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַעֲב֖וֹט <WH5667> the pledge הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> abroad
וְאִם־ <WH518> If אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And if the man עָנִ֖י <WH6041> [be] poor ה֑וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> thou shalt not sleep בַּעֲבֹטֽוֹ׃ <WH5667> with his pledge

הָשֵׁב֩ <WH7725> In any case תָּשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> again ל֤וֹ אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַעֲבוֹט֙ <WH5667> him the pledge כְּבֹ֣א <WH935> goeth down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> when the sun וְשָׁכַ֥ב <WH7901> that he may sleep בְּשַׂלְמָת֖וֹ <WH8008> in his own raiment וּבֵֽרֲכֶ֑ךָּ <WH1288> and bless וּלְךָ֙ תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become צְדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> thee and it shall be righteousness לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> unto thee before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <WH6231> Thou shalt not oppress שָׂכִ֖יר <WH7916> an hired servant עָנִ֣י <WH6041> [that is] poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> and needy מֵאַחֶ֕יךָ <WH251> [whether he be] of thy brethren א֧וֹ <WH176> or מִגֵּרְךָ֛ <WH1616> or of thy strangers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּאַרְצְךָ֖ <WH776> that [are] in thy land בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> within thy gates

בְּיוֹמוֹ֩ <WH3117> At his day תִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> thou shalt give שְׂכָר֜וֹ <WH7939> [him] his hire וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not תָב֧וֹא <WH935> go down עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> against הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> neither shall the sun כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עָנִי֙ <WH6041> upon it for he [is] poor ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְאֵלָ֕יו <WH5921> against ה֥וּא <WH1931> he נֹשֵׂ֖א <WH5375> and setteth אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his heart וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יִקְרָ֤א <WH7121> upon it lest he cry עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> against אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> against thee unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> and it be sin ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יוּמְת֤וּ <WH4191> shall not be put to death אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> The fathers עַל־ <WH5921> and בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> for the children וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> neither shall the children לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יוּמְת֣וּ <WH4191> be put to death עַל־ <WH5921> and אָב֑וֹת <WH1> for the fathers אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <WH2399> for his own sin יוּמָֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> shall be put to death ס

לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַטֶּ֔ה <WH5186> Thou shalt not pervert מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> the judgment גֵּ֣ר <WH1616> of the stranger יָת֑וֹם <WH3490> [nor] of the fatherless וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַחֲבֹ֔ל <WH2254> to pledge בֶּ֖גֶד <WH899> raiment אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <WH490> a widow's

וְזָכַרְתָּ֗ <WH2142> But thou shalt remember כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עֶ֤בֶד <WH5650> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֙יתָ֙ <WH1961> become בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֛ <WH6299> redeemed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֙ <WH6680> thee thence therefore I command לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> thee to do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תִקְצֹר֩ <WH7114> When thou cuttest down קְצִֽירְךָ֨ <WH7105> thine harvest בְשָׂדֶ֜ךָ <WH7704> in thy field וְשָֽׁכַחְתָּ֧ <WH7911> and hast forgot עֹ֣מֶר <WH6016> a sheaf בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> in the field לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> thou shalt not go again לְקַחְתּ֔וֹ <WH3947> to fetch לַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> it it shall be for the stranger לַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> for the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> and for the widow יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> order יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <WH1288> may bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> thee in all the work יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3027> of thine hands

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תַחְבֹּט֙ <WH2251> When thou beatest זֵֽיתְךָ֔ <WH2132> thine olive tree לֹ֥א <WH3808> over תְפָאֵ֖ר <WH6286> thou shalt not go over the boughs אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <WH310> again לַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> it shall be for the stranger לַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> for the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> and for the widow יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תִבְצֹר֙ <WH1219> When thou gatherest כַּרְמְךָ֔ <WH3754> the grapes of thy vineyard לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְעוֹלֵ֖ל <WH5953> thou shalt not glean אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <WH310> [it] afterward לַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> it shall be for the stranger לַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> for the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> and for the widow יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וְזָ֣כַרְתָּ֔ <WH2142> And thou shalt remember כִּי־ <WH3588> for עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> become בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֙ <WH6680> therefore I command לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> thee to do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס
